mapper.insert:
select board_seq.nextval as board_no from dual
insert all into board(board_no, board_content, member_no, board_writer) values(#{board_no}, #{board_content}, #{member_no}, #{board_writer})
into bpconnect(bpconnect_seq, board_no, board_pic_no) values(getbp_seq(), #{board_no}, #{pic})
mapper.select: select * from ( select b.*, r.reply_no, r.reply_content, r.reply_writer, r.writer_no, r.depth, (select count(*) from reply where b.board_no = reply.board_no) as board_reply_count, row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY b.board_no ORDER BY b.board_no) as rk from ( select f.friend_no from friend_test f where f.member_no = 62 and f.friend_state = 1 ) inner join board b on friend_no = b.member_no left outer join (select * from reply where depth = 0) r on b.board_no = r.board_no ) where rk < 3
